articles.author: Mike Ives
articles.title: Fox Christmas Tree Catches Fire in New York City - The New York Times
articles.description: The police said that a man was in custody in relation to the blaze. The 50-foot tree had been ceremonially lit days earlier in an “All-American” festive broadcast.
articles.content: Officials in Oakland, Calif., said this week that they were investigating an episode in which at least one person set fire to a 52-foot Christmas tree in Jack London Square early Monday. An aerosol c… [+758 chars]

articles.title: 'Cause you're a Singapore boy': US rappers' song sparks creative spin-offs on TikTok - AsiaOne
articles.description: There are many ways to show off one's national identity, but some TikTokers have found a better option — by using a soundbite from an American rapper. The viral TikTok soundbite goes, "Cause you're a Singapore boy, or you an island boy". American rapper Flyys…
articles.content:
There are many ways to show off one's national identity, but some TikTokers have found a better option by using a soundbite from an American rapper.
